```{r}
library(bnlearn)
library(Rgraphviz)
`:=` <- `<-`
# install.packages("magrittr") # package installations are only needed the first time you use it
# install.packages("dplyr")    # alternative installation of the %>%
# library(magrittr) # needs to be run every time you start R and want to use %>%
# library(dplyr)    # alternatively, this also loads %>%
df <- read.csv("data/cleansed_data.csv")
df$Baths = as.factor(as.character(df$Baths))
df$Beds = as.factor(as.character(df$Beds))
df
# sapply(df, class)
```

```{r}
dag <- model2network("[Neigh][Beds|Type][Baths|Type][Type][Zest|Beds:Baths:Neigh:Type][Rent|Beds:Baths:Neigh][ROI|Zest:Rent]")
graphviz.plot(dag)
```
```{r}
fit = bn.fit(dag, df)
fit
```
